name: run_bash_command
description: Run a bash command on a Debian 12 system.

command.description: The command to be run. Must be a valid shell command.

name: google_search
description: Run a google search on a given string.

query.description: The query to be searched. Must be a string.

name: fetch_links
description: Retrieve all linked absolute links on a webpage from a url.

url.description: The url to retrieve links from.

name: fetch_website_text
description: Fetch and clean text from a website url.

url.description: The url to retrieve text from.

name: capture_screenshot
description: Capture and save an image of the desktop for viewing.

returns.description: The relative path to the saved image.
